persName.forename: Alexander Augustus Frederick William Alfred George

note.p: Birth: Kensington Palace, London, England (14 April 1874 )
Career: Governor General of South Africa (1923-1931); Governor General of Canada (1941-1946)
Honours: CVO 1897; KCVO 1898; DSO 1900; GCVO 1904; GCB 1911; CMG 1917; Earl 1917; GCMG 1923; KG 1928; GMMG 1936
Obituaries: Biographical Memoirs of Fellows of the Royal Society 1957 vol 3 pp 1-5, plate, by E C Dodds
